title: Riding on air: the HM-2 Sidewall hovercraft
creator_credit: Southern Photographic Studios and Ken Blackman
brief_description: Shows research and development of the hovercraft as designers and engineers collaborate in creating an advanced model. Covers the evolution of the hovercraft in Britain. Commentary by Raymond Baxter.
